name: teradeck-online
description: TeraDeck Online - Juego de cartas multijugador digital

scripts.build: npm run frontend:build && npm run backend:build
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:backend:coverage && npm run test:frontend:coverage
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.test:backend: npm run test --workspace=backend && npm run test --workspace=frontend
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix --workspace=frontend && npm run lint:fix --workspace=backend && npm run lint:fix --workspace=shared
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check --workspace=frontend && npm run type-check --workspace=backend && npm run type-check --workspace=shared
scripts.clean: npm run clean --workspace=frontend && npm run clean --workspace=backend && npm run clean --workspace=shared
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --workspace=frontend && npm install --workspace=backend && npm install --workspace=shared

author: Equipo TeraDeck
